articles.title: Data Quality Management Guide Book
articles.description: Turn Bad Data into AI-Ready Assets. The ultimate data quality management guidebook â€” boosting AI performance by 200% through precision diagnostics, synthetic data, and compliance-ready pipelines.

faqs.question: What does 'AI-Ready Data' actually mean?
faqs.answer: AI-Ready Data goes beyond basic cleaning. It means your datasets are scientifically validated for statistical integrity, semantic coherence, and domain fidelity.

faqs.question: How does Pebblous handle synthetic data differently?
faqs.answer: Pebblous ensures physical fidelity, strategic long-tail diversity, and uses synthetic evaluation sets as a 'Final Exam' to rigorously benchmark AI performance improvements.

faqs.question: What regulations does the Data Clinic help comply with?
faqs.answer: Pebblous Data Clinic aligns with the EU AI Act, GDPR, and ISO/IEC standards including 25024, 5259, and 42119.

articles.title: The Birth of the Intelligent Parrot: The LLM Intelligence Debate and Emergent Possibilities
articles.description: Is a large language model (LLM) a stochastic parrot or emergent intelligence? An in-depth analysis of LLM's intellectual status based on neuroscience, mechanistic interpretability, and cognitive psychology research.

articles.title: What is Physical AI? The Difference Between LLM and VLA, and Data Strategy
articles.description: What is Physical AI? From LLM (language) to VLM (vision) to VLA (action), explaining the evolution and differences of AI models. Key data strategies including the $40B market, sensor fusion, and Sim-to-Real Gap.

articles.title: Physical AI Data Pipeline: AI-Ready Data Solutions for Manufacturing Innovation
articles.description: Transform manufacturing floor data into AI-trainable formats. Data pipeline construction strategies for global manufacturing competitiveness and Pebblous data solutions.

articles.title: The Paradigm Shift of Enterprise Ontology: From Semantic Web to Palantir
articles.description: Comparative analysis of traditional Semantic Web ontology and Palantir Foundry's operational ontology. From OWA vs CWA, kinetic layers, AIP Logic to OAG.
